New Records: Bowden Francis is now part of some awesome baseball history by joining the list of fewest hits allowed in a 9 start span of one season (min. 60 IP) with 24 hits
Key Match Events: The Toronto Blue Jays lost to the Texas Rangers 2-0 on Wednesday night at Globe Life Field
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bowden Francis' excellent start despite the loss, his impressive stats this season, and his potential for a rotation spot next year
Others: The World Champion Rangers are 73-79 in a disappointing follow-up year, Alek Manoah and Ricky Tiedemann undergoing surgeries and not able to pitch for at least a large portion of the 2025 season
